    Exception thrown when an acquirable element is accessed without proper ownership.

    MinestomThread
     
    ThreadDispatcher<P,E extends Tickable>
    ThreadDispatcher can be used to dispatch updates (ticks) across a number of "partitions" (such as chunks) that house Tickable instances (such as entities).
    ThreadDispatcher.Update<P,E>
     
    ThreadDispatcher.Update.ElementRemove<P,E>
    Removes an element.
    ThreadDispatcher.Update.ElementUpdate<P,E>
    Updates an element}, signalling that it is a part of partition.
    ThreadDispatcher.Update.PartitionLoad<P,E>
    Registers a new partition.
    ThreadDispatcher.Update.PartitionUnload<P,E>
    Deletes an existing partition.
